Headline: #75 74th-75th |Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony island, 76th,  South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony island, 76th,  South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 95th due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 95th due to signal problems.

Shuttles buses have been requested from 95th to 63rd to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#29 State

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
